title: 2008 Spanish Grand Prix
summary: The 2008 Spanish Grand Prix (formally the Formula 1 Gran Premio de España Telefónica 2008)[3] was a Formula One motor race held on 27 April 2008 at the Circuit de Catalunya, Barcelona, Spain. It was the fourth race of the 2008 Formula One World Championship. Kimi Räikkönen for the Ferrari team won the 66-lap race starting from pole position. Felipe Massa finished second in the other Ferrari, and Lewis Hamilton was third in a McLaren.
